item.title: Read me
item.description: Kaslaanka A minimalist theme for Hugo. Live Demo at: m1cr0xf7.github.io/kaslaanka this theme is a fork of Hugo-tanka theme. this theme is a “do it yourself” theme, you probably want to change the css to make it your taste, use custom.css to do it. Description minimalist theme easily customizable easy to setup does not need any javascript (javascript is optional) works as a blog or/and a personal website gives you a space to be creative new features remove the bloat (utterances comments, progressivly, highlight.

item.title: Kaslaanka Theme Demo
item.description: Kaslaanka is a Bootstrap based minimalist theme for Hugo Typography Follows the Bootstrap based typography. h1 Heading h2 Heading h3 Heading h4 Heading h5 Heading h6 Heading This is bold text This is bold text This is italic text This is italic text Deleted text Block quotes are written like so. They can span multiple paragraphs, if you like. Some text, and some code and then a nice plain link with title.
